channel.title: Autospawn monsters' max hit/Refrain from attacking
channel.description:
I'd like to change some of my Autospawned monsters' max possible hit to a player, and possibly make them not attack at all. (Not attack at all = Pest Control Portals)
A lot of my Monsters hit 30, and regardless of the level, won't differ.
